const response = await client.ingest.putPipeline({
  id: "set_os",
  description: "sets the value of host.os.name from the field os",
  processors: [
    {
      set: {
        field: "host.os.name",
        value: "{{{os}}}",
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.ingest.simulate({
  id: "set_os",
  docs: [
    {
      _source: {
        os: "Ubuntu",
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response1);
